name: Dial!
description:
As an unwitting employee of a call center dabling with dimensional portals to increase sales across time, you are accidentally bridged with the mind of someone about to have a shootout in the wild west, your rotary phone in control of its revolver! In this particular dimension, it appears animals are the ones doing the shooting.

VIDEO DEMO: https://youtu.be/JBIpaOP9wSI

INSTRUCTIONS: This game is meant to be played with a modified rotary telephone. To emulate the rotary input, hold down 'd' to start dialing', then press 'p' once for each rotary pulse, then let go of 'd'. For example, to dial 3 on the rotary, hold 'd', hit 'p' three times, then release 'd'.
